charinfo.name: Zaji
charinfo.description: Zaji is a Konoha Chuunin, and one who constantly boasts about his abilities, regardless of it is warranted or not. Zaji is a sensor, using his abilities to sense out enemies and prevent them attacking.

abilities.name: Chakra Sense
abilities.description: Zaji senses the battlefield and his enemies. For 2 turns, Zaji and his allies will be invulnerable to all original damage of 25 or less. The following 2 turns, if 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' is used, the physical damage it deals will deal an additional 5 damage.

abilities.name: Momentum Reversal
abilities.description: Zaji uses his speed to reverse a powerful skill. For 1 turn, the first new skill the enemy team uses that deals an original damage of 35 or more will be countered. Also, for 1 turn 'Exploding Chakra Kunai' will deal an additional 10 physical damage. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Exploding Chakra Kunai
abilities.description: Using a kunai set to explode with chakra, Zaji deals 15 physical damage to one enemy and 1 turn after, that enemy will receive 15 chakra damage*.

abilities.name: Zaji Kunai Block
abilities.description: This skill makes Zaji invulnerable for 1 turn.
